reference_a:
@inproceedings{wang2014,
  title = {{{StudentLife}}: assessing mental health, academic performance and behavioral trends of college students using smartphones},
  shorttitle = {{{StudentLife}}},
  booktitle = {Proceedings of the 2014 {{ACM International Joint Conference}} on {{Pervasive}} and {{Ubiquitous Computing}}},
  author = {Wang, Rui and Chen, Fanglin and Chen, Zhenyu and Li, Tianxing and Harari, Gabriella and Tignor, Stefanie and Zhou, Xia and Ben-Zeev, Dror and Campbell, Andrew T.},
  date = {2014-09-13},
  series = {{{UbiComp}} '14},
  pages = {3--14},
  publisher = {Association for Computing Machinery},
  location = {New York, NY, USA},
  doi = {10.1145/2632048.2632054}
}
reference_b:
@article{adler2022,
  title = {Machine learning for passive mental health symptom prediction: {{Generalization}} across different longitudinal mobile sensing studies},
  shorttitle = {Machine learning for passive mental health symptom prediction},
  author = {Adler, Daniel A. and Wang, Fei and Mohr, David C. and Choudhury, Tanzeem},
  date = {2022-04-27},
  journaltitle = {PLOS ONE},
  shortjournal = {PLOS ONE},
  volume = {17},
  number = {4},
  pages = {e0266516},
  publisher = {Public Library of Science},
  issn = {1932-6203},
  doi = {10.1371/journal.pone.0266516}
}
topics: students, mental health, academic performance, stress, activity
additional_comments: More raw unaggregated data available, some item coding unclear, data preaggregated by Adler et al.

features.name: happy
features.coding:
If you answered yes to the happiness question, how happy do you feel?
1 = A little bit
2 = Somewhat
3 = Very much
4 = Extremely

features.name: happyornot
features.coding: Do you feel AT ALL happy right now?

features.name: sad
features.coding:
If you answered yes to the sadness question, how sad do you feel?
1 = A little bit
2 = Somewhat
3 = Very much
4 = Extremely

features.name: sadornot
features.coding: Do you feel AT all sad right now?

features.name: social_number
features.coding:
How many people did you have contact with yesterday, including anyone you said hello to, chatted, talked or discussed matters with, whether you did it face-to-face, by telephone, by mail or on the internet, and whether you personally knew the person or not? Please select one of the following categories that best matches your estimate:

1 = 0-4 persons
2 = 5-9 persons
3 = 10-19 persons
4 = 20-49 persons
5 = 50-99 persons 
6 = over 100 persons

features.name: stress_level
features.coding:
Right now, I am ...
1 = A little stressed
2 = Definitely Stressed
3 = Stressed out
4 = Feeling good
5 = Feeling great

Recoded to be ordinal

features.name: sleep_hour
features.coding:
How many hours did you sleep last night?
Unclear coding: Could either be raw numeric, or coded as indicated in the codebook: 
1 = <3  
2 = 3.5  
3 = 4  
4 = 4.5  
5 = 5  
6 = 5.5  
7 = 6  
8 = 6.5  
9 = 7  
10 = 7.5  
11 = 8  
12 = 8.5  
13 = 9  
14 = 9.5  
15 = 10  
16 = 10.5  
17 = 11  
18 = 11.5  
19 = 12

features.name: sleep_quality
features.coding:
How would you rate your overall sleep last night?
1 = Very good
2 = Fairly good
3 = Fairly bad
4 = Very bad

features.name: difficult_stay_awake
features.coding:
How often did you have trouble staying awake yesterday while in class, eating meals or engaging in social activity?
1 = None
2 = Once
3 = Twice
4 = Three or more times

features.name: anxious
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was anxious, easily upset.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: calm
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was calm, emotionally stable.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: conventional
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was conventional, uncreative.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: critical
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was critical, quarrelsome.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: dependable
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was dependable, self-disciplined.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: disorganized
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was disorganized, careless.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: enthusiastic
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was extraverted, enthusiastic.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: open_to_experiences
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was open to new experiences, complex.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: reserved
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was reserved, quiet.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely

features.name: sympathetic
features.coding:
In the past 15 minutes, I was sympathetic, warm.
1 = Not at all
2 = A little
3 = Somewhat
4 = Very
5 = Extremely
